Text: English Neighborhood:  The name speaks to the geography of the region, "bergen" being the Dutch word for "hills."

Text: English Neighborhood:  Earlier attempts at settlement at Achter Col ("behind the ridge") and Vriessendael had been compromised in conflicts with the precolonial population, phratries of the Lenape known by their exonyms, the Hackensack and the Tappan.
